Rat Invaders

GAME OVER

Me-ouch! The mice have finally succeeded in their nefarious plan to invade your territory and infest your slumber nest with their cheesy little feet. Despite your valiant efforts to fend them off, their sheer numbers and relentless attacks proved too much for even a mighty feline like you. Your territory has fallen to the rodent horde, and they're throwing a cheesy victory party in your slumber nest as we speak. Don't worry, though--you'll have your revenge soon enough. Time to start planning your epic comeback!

YOU WIN!

Looks like the mice didn't know who they were messing with when they tried to invade your territory, oh mighty feline! You clawed your way to victory and sent them running with their tails between their legs (and cheese in their paws). Your slumber nest is safe once again, thanks to your ferocious fighting skills and quick reflexes. Congratulations on being the top cat in town!
